scripts.build:ui: rimraf build && echo "Deleted build folder" && cd ../FullstackOpen 2019/part2/phonebook/ && echo "Switched directory to frontend" && npm run build --prod && echo "Running production build" && xcopy /S /I build "../../../FullStackOpen 2019 Phonebook Backend/build" && echo "Copying new build to backend"
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
